item.title: Who Needs Rights Anyway? A Breakdown of the Supreme(ly Broken) Court
item.description: I am furious, sad, exhausted, and absolutely disgusted by the all-out war being waged against LGBTQ+ people in the United States. For the past year and a half, you may have noticed that this blog has been silent, and this is the reason: I just couldnâ€™t.
